Question: Chris Spedding says this person' playing is "direct, incisive and unpretentious".
Hints: This person reprised his role in Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides, released in May 2011.
The 1967–68 break in touring allowed this person to focus on open tunings, which are commonly used for slide guitar.
This person attended Wentworth Primary School with Mick Jagger and was his neighbour until 1954, when the family moved.
